job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field.

jd: From: Kiran, 3ktechnologies gutala.kiran@3ktechnologies.com Reply to: gutala.kiran@3ktechnologies.com Job Title: Business Analyst (Workday)Location: Remote Job Summary: We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Business Analyst with expertise in Workday to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for analyzing business needs, implementing solutions, and optimizing our Workday system to enhance efficiency and support our organizational goals.Key Responsibilities:Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and document business requirements related to HR, finance, and operational processes.Analyze and model business processes, identifying areas for improvement and optimization within Workday.Configure and maintain Workday modules to align with business needs.Conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) and facilitate training sessions for end-users.Support data migration and system integration efforts.Generate reports and dashboards to track key performance indicators and assist in decision-making.Stay updated on Workday releases and new features, providing recommendations for enhancements.Act as a liaison between IT and business units, ensuring clear communication and understanding of requirements.Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field.3+ years of experience as a Business Analyst, with a focus on Workday implementations and configurations.Proficiency in data analysis and reporting tools.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.Workday certification is a plus.Thanks & RegardsKiran KumarTechnical Recruiter1114 Cadillac Ct, Milpitas, CA 950353K Technologies, LLC www.3ktechnologies.com gutala.kiran@3ktechnologies.comAnalytics | BI | Big Data | Cloud |Software Engg.
